verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* family \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* other \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*

\w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*, together \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* livestock.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*:

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Kohathite|strong="H6956"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*. \w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w received|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Simeon|strong="H8099"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2677"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \w received|strong="H3498"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H5892"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim, \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2677"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* \w received|strong="H5892"\w* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H5892"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, Asher, \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \w received|strong="H5892"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w designated|strong="H5414"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*

\w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Kohathite|strong="H6956"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3878"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*:

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w Kiriath-arba|strong="H7153"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*), \w with|strong="H2022"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. (Arba \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* father \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*.)

But \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* around \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* \w as|strong="H5892"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* possession.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*: \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w manslayer|strong="H7523"\w*, \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*,
\w Jattir|strong="H3492"\w*, Eshtemoa,
\w Holon|strong="H2473"\w*, \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*,

\w Ain|strong="H5871"\w*, \w Juttah|strong="H3194"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*—\w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H5892"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, \w together|strong="H8147"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w from|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H1391"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* they gave them \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w*,
\w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Almon|strong="H5960"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* Kohathite \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: \w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim

\w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w were|strong="H2022"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* Ephraim (\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w manslayer|strong="H7523"\w*), \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*,

Aijalon, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Gath-rimmon|strong="H1667"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H4276"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w they|strong="H5892"\w* \w were|strong="H8147"\w* given \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Gath-rimmon|strong="H1667"\w*—\w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w together|strong="H8147"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Kohathite \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* what \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* Gershonites \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given: \w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w they|strong="H5892"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given \w Golan|strong="H1474"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w manslayer|strong="H7523"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Beeshterah—\w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w together|strong="H8147"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w From|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3485"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* they \w were|strong="H4294"\w* given \w Kishion|strong="H7191"\w*, \w Daberath|strong="H1705"\w*,
\w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w En-gannim|strong="H5873"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w Helkath|strong="H2520"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w were|strong="H4940"\w* given \w to|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* what \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Merarite \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* (\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*) \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given: \w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* they \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given \w Jokneam|strong="H3362"\w*, \w Kartah|strong="H7177"\w*,
\w Dimnah|strong="H1829"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Nahalal|strong="H5096"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w From|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H7205"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* they \w were|strong="H4294"\w* given \w Bezer|strong="H1221"\w*, \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*,
\w Kedemoth|strong="H6932"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Mephaath|strong="H4158"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w they|strong="H5892"\w* \w were|strong="H1410"\w* given \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w manslayer|strong="H7523"\w*, \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*,

\w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w then|strong="H1121"\w*, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w forty-eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w territory|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.
